mdRecord.dcterms:title: 23227 The Home of George Washington, Founder of our Republic, Mt. Vernon, Virginia.
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Stereoscopic view of the east front of the Mount Vernon Mansion from the southeast. A series of benches are seen on the lawn in the foreground. Mounted on gray board. The publishers imprint on the front of the card reads: Keystone View Company, Manufacturers and Publishers, Copyrighted made in the U. S. A. Meadville, Pa., New York, N. Y., Chicago, Ill., London, England. Title: 23227 The Home of George Washington, Founder of our Republic, Mt. Vernon, Virginia. Part of a series - P32 - P 163. The reverse of the card includes information George Washington and Mount Vernon. Copyright by The Keystone View Company.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Mount Vernon (Va. : Estate)
